sentences.sContent: In so many countries that I covered in Southeast Asia it was a given that the elites would take over public land as a kind of perquisite of power.
sentences.sContent_eng: In so many countries that I covered in Southeast Asia it was a given that the elites would take over public land as a kind of perquisite of power.
sentences.sCn: 在我报道过的许多东南亚国家，精英阶层拥有将公有土地挪为私用的特权，是人尽皆知的常态。

synos.tran: 额外补贴；临时津贴；特权

remMethod.val: per + quisit(要求) + e →要求(得到全部利益) → 利益
